title: Venus Magnum
summaries: The Venus Magnum is a Hardmode gun dropped by Plantera with a (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) 14.29*1/7 (14.29%) or (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) 16.67*1/6 (16.67%) chance. Musket Balls and Silver/Tungsten Bullets(Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) fired from this weapon gain the properties of High Velocity Bullets, but retain their original damage. (Old-gen console version) While it cannot be autofired, the Venus Magnum's use time is lower than most semiautomatic weapons, allowing it to be manually fired at a similar rate.

statistics.Damage: 50 (Desktop, Console and Mobile versions) / 36 (Old-gen console and 3DS versions) (Ranged)
statistics.Tooltip: Shoots a powerful, high velocity bullet
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
